about_the_game:
Demo Disclaimer: The demo is still under active development. Currently its goal is to give you a quick introduction to the mechanics in the early stage of the game!

Demo includes: 

  • 50 elements

  • Up to 30 board upgrades

  • 10 player levels

  • Evolution tree

In the full game you will discover over 100+ beautifully hand-drawn elements as you help your World evolve infinitely through time! And finally, maybe, you will know what came first - the chicken, or the egg?!

  • Begin your adventure with a burst of resources! Uncover treasure chests brimming with essential elements to kickstart your evolutionary journey.

  • The Core of Creation: Combine simple elements to unlock surprising and satisfying new discoveries. Experiment, innovate, and watch your World transform!

  • Even while you're away, your World continues to evolve. Witness the magic of idle progress as your resource collection multiplies and your creation expands. Watch your wealth soar into the millions!

Create, explore, and evolve - start your enchanting evolutionary adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Start from the most basic elements and help your World evolve through the timeline of progress. Merge elements, unlock new discoveries, and enjoy a satisfying blend of idle and strategic gameplay! And you know what? Your World continues to evolve even while you're away!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
